author: James Stephens
title: The Best All-Weather Tires
text: Gear up for a driving experience that's as smooth as butter and as safe as can be, no matter what the weather throws your way! Drive effortlessly through rain, snow, and sunshine with the right choice of tires. All-weather tires are your ticket to a hassle-free journey in every season. Here, we're diving into the top contenders in the tire game, promising you the best mix of performance, toughness, and safety. Get ready to hit the road with confidence as we explore the best all-weather tires that make driving a joy, rain or shine! Michelin CrossClimate 2 Michelin has long been synonymous with top-tier tire technology, and the CrossClimate 2 is no exception. Combining the benefits of summer and winter tires, the CrossClimate 2 boasts impressive wet and dry traction, along with excellent snow performance. Its unique V-shaped tread pattern provides stability and control in various road conditions, making it ideal for drivers looking for a reliable, all-weather solution. Goodyear Assurance WeatherReady Goodyear Assurance WeatherReady is designed with a tread compound that adapts to changing temperatures, offering reliable traction in both wet and dry conditions. The tire's sweeping tread grooves help evacuate water efficiently, reducing the risk of hydroplaning. Additionally, the zigzag biting edges enhance grip on snow and ice, making it a solid choice for those living in areas with colder climates. Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 Plus Continental's ExtremeContact DWS06 Plus is another top performer in the all-weather tire category. Its unique tread pattern features traction grooves and biting edges for enhanced grip on slippery surfaces. The tire's SportPlus Technology provides responsive handling and precise steering in dry conditions, making it a favorite among drivers who demand high performance in addition to all-weather capability. Bridgestone Weather Control A005 EVO Bridgestone Weather Control A005 EVO is engineered to deliver consistent performance across various weather conditions. Its high-density siping provides extra biting edges for improved traction on snow and ice, while the wide central groove helps disperse water efficiently for enhanced wet grip. The tire's durability and versatility make it a reliable choice for year-round driving. Pirelli Cinturato All Season Plus Pirelli's Cinturato All Season Plus focuses on delivering a comfortable and quiet ride without compromising performance. The tire features an innovative tread pattern that provides excellent grip on both dry and wet surfaces. It also incorporates special siping for improved traction on light snow, making it a well-rounded option for drivers seeking a balance of performance and comfort. Of course, these are just some of the options available to you. Selecting the best all-weather tires involves considering factors like traction, durability, and performance in various weather conditions. Drivers will find that most of the options mentioned above stand out as top contenders, offering drivers a reliable and versatile solution for year-round driving. However, ultimately, the choice depends on individual preferences, driving habits, and the specific weather challenges faced in your region, as well as your make and model. If you are in the market for a new set of all-weather tires, search for a tire store near you!

author: tialaramex
title: PyPI dropped existing support for digital attestations
text:
PyPI dropped existing support for digital attestations
PyPI dropped existing support for digital attestationsPosted Nov 15, 2024 1:47 UTC (Fri) by tialaramex (subscriber, #21167)
In reply to:
[PyPI dropped existing support for digital attestations](/Articles/998226/)by NYKevin
Parent article:
[PyPI now supports digital attestations](/Articles/998215/)
Also, since this is all in service of _security_ the important question is what _security_ consequences exist for any of these paths and usability is crucial to that.
A solution that's "perfect" but actually nobody will use isn't perfect it's useless. In contrast some fairly weak security that everybody just uses reflexively is fairly effective. And, you can get people used to the idea that they've "always" insisted on security, because that was the default, which makes ratcheting the security a plausible direction once you've got them on board.
A solution that's "perfect" but actually nobody will use isn't perfect it's useless. In contrast some fairly weak security that everybody just uses reflexively is fairly effective. And, you can get people used to the idea that they've "always" insisted on security, because that was the default, which makes ratcheting the security a plausible direction once you've got them on board.

author: Nouvelles
title: Sánchez rencontre le PDG de Renault, Luca de Meo, en pleine crise tarifaire et sectorielle
text:
2024-10-24 16:35:00
MADRID, 24 octobre (EUROPA PRESS) –
Le président du gouvernement, Pedro Sánchez, et le PDG du groupe Renault, Luca de Meo, se sont rencontrés ce jeudi au Palais de la Moncloa à Madrid pour aborder les défis du secteur automobile en Europe et la crise de compétitivité découlant du ralentissement des ventes. et le débarquement des marques chinoises sur le Vieux Continent.
Au cours de la réunion, comme le rapporte La Moncloa, Sánchez a souligné le travail réalisé par l’Exécutif central depuis 2018 pour promouvoir la transformation de l’industrie automobile en Espagne et mener la révolution verte.
Du côté du Gouvernement, ils valorisent positivement l’impact du Perte du véhicule électrique et connecté, qui représente un investissement public de plus de 5 000 millions d’euros. Le lancement du quatrième appel, doté de 1 250 millions d’euros (250 millions d’euros de subventions et 1 000 millions d’euros de prêts), est prévu avant la fin de l’année pour continuer à promouvoir l’électrification du secteur automobile.
De même, à travers le plan Moves III, le ministère de l’Industrie et du Tourisme a mobilisé plus de 1 500 millions d’euros avec les appels lancés à ce jour.
De Meo, pour sa part, a mis sur la table le défi auquel sont confrontés les constructeurs automobiles en cette période de transition vers les véhicules électriques et d’arrivée de la concurrence chinoise sur le marché communautaire.
#Sánchez #rencontre #PDG #Renault #Luca #Meo #pleine #crise #tarifaire #sectorielle

author: 健康2.0
title: 苗可麗一晚包300顆手指廢了！水煎包能當正餐嗎？水煎包＋1樣變營養餐
text:
健康2.0 苗可麗一晚包300顆手指廢了！水煎包能當正餐嗎？水煎包＋1樣變營養餐 閱讀全文
健康2.0 2025年4月30日 下午5:00 女星苗可麗在最近一期實境節目中，經歷了一場「煎包地獄」！苗可麗在夜市擺攤包 水煎包 ，竟然一個晚上包了300顆，她也淚喊「手指要廢掉了！」你常吃水煎包當正餐嗎？專家提醒這樣吃不健康！
苗可麗體驗攤販人生 淪陷「煎包地獄」 《我們這一攤2》夜市擺攤實境節目由老班底胡宇威帶領，與苗可麗、禾浩辰、蔡昌憲和蔡凡熙一同征戰各大夜市。在其中一集的拍攝中，苗可麗回憶起在宜蘭羅東夜市的經歷，她形容自己在那晚的「煎包地獄」中，手指幾乎快廢掉。她提到，麵皮的柔軟程度、包餡的角度和手勢，都直接影響著包子能否成功成形；如果皮太硬，或者皮與餡料的油脂黏在一起，那就根本無法包好。
那晚，苗可麗變成水煎包高手，她包了大約300顆水煎包。回想起來，她苦笑表示，這樣的經歷讓她真切感受到攤商們的辛勞，也讓她更加敬佩那些每天都在夜市中辛苦工作的攤販們。
看更多： 夜市邊吃邊走最燃脂？吃這碗麵代價得走4小時 烤魷魚走106分鐘！
午餐只吃水煎包夠嗎？ 你是水煎包愛好者嗎？有些上班族午餐會買2顆水煎包解決，簡單又快速，但這樣能提供足夠營養嗎？營養師許睿涵表示，2顆水煎包所提供的熱量約300～450大卡，對一般上班族來說，這樣的熱量可能不夠，尤其是在活動量較大或工作強度較高的情況下，下午容易感到飢餓，可能又會再找點心或飲料來補充能量。
水煎包搭配什麼一起吃能兼顧營養？ 許睿涵進一步提到，水煎包、煎餃、鍋貼等類似的餐點，雖然方便快捷，但這些食物常常缺乏維生素與礦物質，可能會影響身體的能量代謝，讓人容易在午餐後感到疲倦。
她建議，可搭配一份蔬菜類如生菜、燙青菜、蒸蔬菜等，或一顆拳頭大小的水果如蘋果、橘子、小番茄等，這樣不僅能增加膳食纖維，還能提供更多的維生素與礦物質。此外，若水煎包的餡料偏油，還可以搭配一些低脂蛋白質來源如水煮蛋、雞胸肉、無糖豆腐，幫助補充蛋白質，並提升飽足感。
看更多： 蛋白質食物如何快速補充？蛋白食物表、排名和蛋白質早餐推薦
水煎包熱量高嗎？外皮、餡料、油脂影響大 水煎包本身的熱量高嗎？許睿涵說明，一顆普通大小的菜肉水煎包，大約有150～250大卡，但如果使用較多油或高熱量餡料（如含較多肉類或油脂的食材），熱量則會增加。水煎包的熱量主要來自外皮的碳水化合物和煎製過程中使用的油，而內餡的絞肉與蔬菜，則提供少量的蛋白質、纖維、維生素和礦物質。總體來說，水煎包雖然美味，但其營養價值仍依餡料而有所不同。
看更多： 9款包餡食物熱量排行 油脂冠軍超多人愛吃！隱形地雷竟是小餛飩？
水煎包吃太多會怎樣？小心體重失控、心血管亮紅燈 許睿涵也提醒，若水煎包吃太多，可能會帶來一些健康風險。由於水煎包的熱量較高，若一次吃太多顆，容易導致熱量攝取過剩，長期如此可能會導致體重上升，增加肥胖風險。此外，水煎包在煎製過程中會吸收不少油脂，重口味的餡料中也可能含有較多鹽分，再加上有些人會額外淋上調味醬汁，這些過多的脂肪和鈉攝取，會增加心血管疾病的風險。
更重要的是，若水煎包成為主要食物來源，可能會導致營養攝取不均，缺乏纖維、維生素和礦物質，對長期健康產生負面影響。因此，適量且均衡的飲食才是保持健康的關鍵。
◎ 圖片來源／翻攝自苗可麗臉書．達志影像/shutterstock提供
◎ 諮詢專家／許睿涵營養師
本文由健康2.0授權報導，未經同意禁止轉載，點此查看 原始文章

author: yahoo
title: El papa afirma que interceder por la paz requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos
text:
Leer todo el artículo EFE Latam El papa afirma que interceder por la paz requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos Agencia EFE 1 de junio de 2024, 12:39 p. m. · 1 min de lectura Enlace copiado
Ciudad del Vaticano, 1 jun (EFE).- El papa Francisco afirmó este sábado que "interceder por la paz es algo que va mucho más allá del simple compromiso político, porque requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos", durante una audiencia en el Vaticano a la Asociación de Laicos Cristianos.
En su discurso el papa destacó la labor de esta asociación de "ser pacificadores". "En un mundo ensangrentado por tantas guerras, sé que comparto con vosotros el compromiso y la oración por la paz".
Y reiteró que "la guerra nunca es inevitable mientras que la paz siempre es posible; y que esto se aplica tanto en las relaciones entre los Estados como en la vida de las familias, las comunidades y el lugar de trabajo"
"Los que saben tomar posición con claridad, pero a la vez sí, construir la paz. se esfuerza por tender puentes, escuchar y comprender a las diferentes partes implicadas, promoviendo el diálogo y la reconciliación", dijo Francisco, que agregó, "interceder por la paz es algo que va mucho más allá del simple compromiso político, porque requiere involucrarse y asumir riesgos"
"En un mundo marcado por conflictos y divisiones, vuestro testimonio como pacificadores, como intercesores por la paz, es más necesario y precioso que nunca", los dijo.
Francisco también afirmó que en estos momentos el mundo "necesita" democracia y que "democrática es aquella sociedad en la que realmente hay un lugar para todos, en la realidad y no sólo en declaraciones y en el papel".
(c) Agencia EFE
